info.short_description: Framapiaf is Framasoft's Mastodon instance. Framasoft is a popular and educational network promoting free software.
info.full_description:
Issu du monde √©ducatif et d√©sormais tourn√©e vers l'√©ducation populaire, Framasoft est avant tout un r√©seau de projets, dont le premier, l'annuaire Framalibre, remonte √† 2001.

Ces projets sont anim√©s par des personnes collaborant autour d'une m√™me volont√© : promouvoir les libert√©s num√©riques.

Le respect des libert√©s fondamentales des utilisatrices et utilisateurs, garanties par des contrats l√©gaux (les licences libres), est au c≈ìur du mouvement libriste et permet de s'assurer que l'humain reste en ma√Ætrise de l'outil num√©rique.

Le but de Framasoft est de proposer, principalement en ligne, un ensemble d'outils concrets et pratiques visant √† faciliter l'adoption :

    de logiciels libres (annuaire, cl√©s USB, installateur‚Ä¶) ;
    de cr√©ations culturelles libres (blog, traduction, maison d'√©dition‚Ä¶) ;
    de services libres (plus de 30 dans le projet D√©googlisons Internet).

Pr√©sent√© comme une ¬´ porte d'entr√©e dans le monde du Libre ¬ª, le r√©seau Framasoft souhaite se positionner comme un trait d'union entre la communaut√© des libristes et le grand public.

info.short_description: chaos.social - because anarchy is much more fun with friends. For and by the chaos community.
info.full_description:
chaos.social - because anarchy is much more fun with friends.
chaos.social is a small Mastodon instance for and by the chaos community. We provide a small community space - be excellent to each other (and read the rules if you're not sure what that means).

Since "Be excellent to each other" is much easier said than done, we have a (non-exhaustive) list of behaviours on our about page that may lead to deletion of toots, and silencing or suspension of accounts, if problems persist.

info.short_description: A place for tech folks to discuss whatever interests them! Adheres to a code of conduct.
info.full_description: A place for tech folks to discuss whatever interests them! Adheres to a code of conduct. Blocks instances with hate speech and/or illegal content.

info.short_description: Welcome to your niu world ! üíó We are a cute and loving international community ÔºØ(‚âß‚ñΩ‚â¶)ÔºØ !
info.full_description:
We are a moderated instance, that aren't supporting harassment nor hateful speech, so what set us apart? Well, unlike many instances like us, we won't prevent you to interact with instances that aren't respecting our rules.
The main language used here is English, but for most of us this isn't our main language, so it's a great place to learn! 

Here, we are open to any subjects, but the main ones are:
- Fictions / Animes / Mangas / Comics
- Gaming / e-Sport / Retro / Speedrun
- Programming / Security / IT stuffs
- Sometime politics / World events
- Pictures and story from around the world <3 

If you want more infos, visit our instance ^-^ !

info.short_description: The Wandering Shop is a Mastodon instance initially geared for the science fiction and fantasy community but open to anyone.
info.full_description: The Wandering Shop is a Mastodon instance initially geared for the science fiction and fantasy community but open to anyone. We want our 'local' timeline to have the feel of a coffee shop at a good convention: tables full of friendly conversation on a wide variety of topics. We welcome everyone who wants to participate, so long as you're willing to abide by our code of conduct.

info.short_description: by *BSD, for *BSD, on *BSD.  and for anyone.
info.full_description: bsd.network is a *BSD-themed Mastodon Instance. General use is encouraged, and everyone is welcome as long as you follow our code of conduct!
info.topic: bsd, openbsd, freebsd, netbsd, social, tech, security, nerdery

info.short_description:
mastodonten.de ist eine Mastodon Instanz offen f√ºr alle netten Leute. :-)
mastodonten.de is a Mastodon instance open to nice people
info.full_description:
Da "Geht gut miteinander um" einfach gesagt als getan ist, haben wir eine (nicht vollst√§ndige) Liste von Verhaltensweisen aufgestellt, die zu einer L√∂schung von Toots und zu einer Blockung von Accounts f√ºhren k√∂nnen, wenn die Probleme fortbestehen. Insbesondere tolerieren wir nicht:


- Bel√§stigung, Stalking, Doxxing
- Rassismus, Sexismus, Beschimpfungen oder deren Bef√ºrwortung
- Diskriminierung von Geschlechtern und sexuellen Minderheiten oder deren Bef√ºrwortung
- Gewaltt√§tige nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolismus oder F√∂rderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus
- Leute kontaktieren, die klar gemacht haben, dass sie keinen Kontakt wollen. Dogpiling
- Nicht markierter sexueller Inhalt, Gewaltdarstellungen oder Werbung
- Nicht getaggte oder automatisierte oder √ºberm√§√üige Werbung
- Bots, die ohne ihre expliziten Anfragen mit Nutzer interagieren

Bitte melden Sie Verhalten, das Sie st√∂rt. Das schlie√üt Verhalten von anderen Instanzen mit ein - wir sind sehr gerne bereit, mit Asshole-Instanzen die Verbindung zu unterbrechen.

Basierend auf dem "About" von chaos.social verf√ºgbar in deren Github-Repository.


Since "Be excellent to each other" is much easier said than done, we have a (non-exhaustive) list of behaviours that may lead to deletion of toots, and silencing or suspension of accounts, if problems persist. In particular, we do not tolerate:

- Harrassment, stalking, doxxing

- Racism, sexism, verbal abuse or advocation thereof

- Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

- Violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism

- Contacting people who made clear they want no contact. Dogpiling/brigading

- Untagged sexual content, gore, or advertisement

- Untagged, or automated, or excessive advertisement

- Bots interacting with users without their explicit requests


Please report behaviour that bothers you. That includes behaviour from other instances - we are very willing stop federating with asshole instances.


(Based on the about of chaos.social)

info.short_description: Unixcorns project instance https://unixcorn.org, mostly french speaking
info.full_description:
Une instance Mastodon tenue √† jour quotidiennement et fournie par Unixcorn. H√©berg√©e en Allemagne, l'un de ses objectif premier est la transparence mais nous vous invitons √† lire l'ensemble des r√®gles d'utilisation. Notre mod√©ration est collaborative, n‚Äôh√©sitez surtout pas √† rapporter tout contenu probl√©matique !

Notre instance est bien s√ªr r√©gie par des r√®gles sp√©cifiques. Premi√®rement aucun sexisme, racisme, homophobie validisme, √¢gisme, grossophobie ou psychophobie, etc n‚Äôest tol√©r√©. Tout message de haine est proscrit, les fascistes et leurs copains nazis sont directement bannis. Dans un autre registre, la publication de spam, de contenu pornographique non d√©sign√© comme tel avec un ‚ÄúContent Warning‚Äù (CW) m√®nent aussi √† une exclusion du serveur. Cette instance Mastodon se veut inclusive et bienveillante, ainsi nous bannirons sans pr√©venir et sans regret. Les comptes bannis ne sont plus accessibles depuis notre instance, vous ne pouvez plus voir leur contenu ni les suivre.
Nous encourageons nos utilisateur-ice-s √† utiliser la fonction de rapport (‚ÄúReport‚Äù) pour nous faire part du contenu et/ou des comptes allant √† l‚Äôencontre de nos r√®gles. D'ailleurs si celles-ci ne vous conviennent pas, ne r√¢lez pas, trouvez simplement un autre serveur.
Nous essayons aussi de mettre en avant l‚Äôaspect activiste de notre d√©marche. Si vous √™tes un-e commercial-e, communiquant-e, travaillant dans le #digital, chez Orange ou la #FrenchTech sachez que vous n‚Äô√™tes pas le/la bienvenu-e. Pendant que nous y sommes si l‚Äô√©criture inclusive vous d√©range sachez que vous n'√™tes qu'√† un clic de souris de la sortie.
Notre r√©seau social, et son r√©seau entier selon nous, est d√©di√© √† la r√©appropriation des moyens de communication et √† la cr√©ation de communaut√©s meilleures pour le collectif. Les cat√©gories de personnes cit√©es dans le paragraphe pr√©c√©dent n'oeuvrant pas du tout (allant m√™me dans le sens contraire) √† la r√©alisation de ces objectifs, elles sont logiquement pas les bienvenues. Merci de rapporter leur pr√©sence si vous les croisez sur notre serveur.

Discussions autour du jeu vid√©o, du japon, de l'informatique et de l'anim√©/manga.

info.short_description: Instance Mastodon francophone et avec une mod√©ration active. Mostly French-speaking Mastodon instance with active moderation.
info.full_description:
oc.todon.fr est une instance Mastodon francophone et avec une mod√©ration active. French-speaking Mastodon instance with active moderation.

R√®gles :

Aucun type de harc√®lement ou de (micro-)agression n'est tol√©r√©, qu'elles soient personnelles ou rel√®vent d'un syst√®me oppressif (misogynie, racisme, LGBTphobies/queerphobie, validisme, etc.). De m√™me pour la promotion de ces oppressions et des mouvements politiques associ√©s (masculinisme, supr√©macisme, etc.).

La pornographie et la nudit√© sont tol√©r√©es pour le moment, mais doivent √™tre obligatoirement indiqu√©es comme NSFW. De m√™me pour contenus sensibles/choquants, qui doivent avoir un Content Warning appropri√©.

Sauf exception accord√©e par l'admin, les publicit√©s sont bannies de cette instance.

info.short_description: Open discussion but skewed toward the topics of technology, information security, privacy, and their political implications.
info.full_description: Free Radical is our social media haven. It's where we talk in an inviting, respectful setting where we can set our own boundaries. We'd love for you to join us!

info.short_description: Maly is a stable, non-tracking Mastodon instance running along other services like our PeerTube instance and a private cloud.
info.full_description:
Hello ! My name is Tijl Van den Brugghen, named KindlyFire online. I run this Mastodon instance and some other public services for anybody to enjoy. I detailed most information on this page, but feel free to ask me anything !

# Guarantees

* We do not track you. (but others on the Fediverse might, no instance can guarantee this)
* Light moderation. The instance rules are defined below.
* We federate with every instance out there. But that does not say we allow every kind of content.

# Rules

Obviously, every instance has to have rules. Without this, although this instance is pretty small, there would be problems. Here they are:

* Respect everyone
* Do not spam (this applies mainly to bots)
* No NSFW without an appropriete Content-Warning.
* Any kind of illigal content is prohibited.
* Have fun üéâ

More information is available on our about page: https://maly.io/about/more

info.short_description: An instance for open source developers, free culture community and dreamers.
info.full_description:
Nasqueron is a budding community of creative people, writers, developers and thinkers. We focus on free culture, ethics and to be a positive change. We share values like respect, justice and equity.

You'll find here like-minded people to connect to, hang out, and build projects.

We focus on free culture, ethics and to be a positive change. When we develop a project, our software is open source our datasources and content are licensed under CC-BY-SA or CC-BY license. We share values like respect, justice and equity.

We like experiments, originality and to discover new things.

We are Nasqueron.

info.short_description: Dedicada principalmente a los temas relacionados con la pol√≠tica, la ciencia y la cultura. Es un espacio abierto al di√°logo constructivo y respetuoso.
info.full_description:
Pol√≠tica ConCiencia pone a tu disposici√≥n un espacio dedicado al intercambio de ideas mediante un di√°logo respetuoso y constructivo entre los individuos. En lo esencial, los temas que nos ocupan pertenecen al √°mbito de la pol√≠tica, la ciencia y la cultura. Aqu√≠, hallar√°s un entorno apropiado para expresarte sin temor a ser censurado por tu postura ideol√≥gica, tus convicciones o tus creencias.

    Para favorecer un medio armonioso, nuestra instancia se apega a un c√≥digo de conducta, el cual debes revisar con detenimiento antes de registrarte (adem√°s de los T√©rminos del servicio). No obstante, a manera de anticipo, debes saber que busca garantizar la libre expresi√≥n en el marco del respeto al derecho de los seres humanos a salvaguardar su dignidad e integridad psicol√≥gica y emocional.

    As√≠ pues, si est√°s de acuerdo en que las conductas ofensivas que abundan en la mayor√≠a de las redes sociales (insultos, ira, difamaciones, humillaciones o pr√°cticas similares), son un obst√°culo para el establecimiento de relaciones sanas entre los miembros de una comunidad, sin duda alguna, este sitio es para ti.

    Al ingresar a esta comunidad, podr√°s entablar contacto con cualquier persona que pertenezca a cualquier otra instancia de la red social Mastodon, lo cual ampl√≠a tus posibilidades de comunicaci√≥n enormemente.

    Finalmente, considera que esta instancia no lucra con tu informaci√≥n personal, de modo que para subsistir requiere de tu participaci√≥n. Si est√° en tus posibilidades, no dudes en donar. Con ello, estar√°s contribuyendo a la diversificaci√≥n de los medios alternativos que fomentan la libertad de expresi√≥n y aumentar√°s las probabilidades de que este servidor, el cual ser√° tu hogar en la federaci√≥n de servidores de Mastodon, siga existiendo en el futuro.
info.topic: Pol√≠tica, ciencia, cultura y otros temas de inter√©s general

info.short_description: This Mastodon instance is for people who care about, support, or build Free, Libre, and Open Source Software (FLOSS).
info.full_description: This Mastodon instance is for people who care about, support, or build Free, Libre, and Open Source Software (FLOSS). Of course, discussions aren't limited to just FLOSS -- let's share our unique interests!  Users on FLOSS.social agree to abide by the Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct, available online at: https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/1/4/code-of-conduct

info.short_description: We are an instance that tries its best to be as welcoming and friendly as possible! Here you can find all kinds of discussion, whether it is anime, te
info.full_description:
Our instance is a place for you to relax and chat. We want you to enjoy yourself and meet new people that you can connect with. We concentrate on making our instance special for what it is -
Open.

This is because we strive to make our instance open to everyone and hope that everyone can connect and meet new people to chat with. Whether you post cute anime pictures, discuss politics, hobbies, or what you did yesterday!

Have fun and please do not post content that breaks international law. Actually, we highly suggest that you do not break the international law.

info.full_description:
We believe in cyberanarchism. And just like any good old-fashioned anarchist collective, we look out for each other. :)
Some of us are students at Bauhaus University. Many are not.

info.full_description: An instance for professional scientists, science communicators, and enthusiasts to interact and share science-related topics and rational thinking to the wider Fediverse.

info.short_description: Its a safe space for Campaigning and NGO groups to access the #openweb Founded on #4opens and moderated by an ethical code of conduct.
info.full_description:
""We can't engage as communities, unless we have money. I can't even express how angry this makes me.""
- an activist group using Facebook. People and organisations who feel this way are our initial targets.

We are launching two new Mastodon instances for activists and campaigners to aid communication of grassroot groups; putting social media back in our hands by providing a free, unfettered home for campaigners, NGO‚Äôs and activists to communicate among their peers and beyond.

This project is a way out of the restricted, algorithmic, for-profit mediation and commercialisation of communication we increasingly experience. If you do not pay to "boost" each post, a Facebook page will only reach 3-6% of members. This soon becomes an expensive drain on limited NGO and activist budgets.
Activists and campaigners alike are ready to shift their outreach away from the corporate social networks paid-per-view ‚Äúwalled gardens‚Äù.

Mastodon is the worlds largest free open source decentralised microblogging network; it‚Äôs thousands of unique, interconnected communities, filled with different people, interests, languages, and needs.
You‚Äôre free to join any community you like, or better yet, host your own, on your own terms. It remains possible for members of each to instance to interact with others.
There is no monopoly by a single commercial company, no ads, and no tracking.

We aim to help activism/campaigning groups to make this step now.
https://campaign.openworlds.info
https://activism.openworlds.info
info.topic: Campaigning and NGO groups working for a better world

info.full_description: A general friendly instance that focused of tech topics, games, and everything fluffy!

info.short_description: The "unofficial" Information Retrieval Mastodon Instance.
info.full_description:
Goal: Make idf.social a viable and valuable social space for anyone working in Information Retrieval and related scientific research.

Everyone welcome but expect some level of geekiness on the instance and federated timelines.

info.short_description: Do you like old hardware ? Do you use them ? Perfect you're welcome here !
info.full_description:
Welcome !
This is an open Mastodon instance, basically.
It's run by the person you see on the right (that's me!) and for now, that's all.
There might be more admins and moderators later if the needs come but alas not yet.

I hope this instance works okay for you, and that you can find a nice and welcoming community here! Feel free to hit me up if you have any questions or requests, be it about this instance, how to make your own instance, or other things not related to Mastodon.

I am actually the only sysadmin of this instance and I can't work full-time on oldbytes.space so, I will do whatever I can in a reasonable time to make it works the best it can.

Rules
This instance has some rules, of course.
First, there are the usual : no sexism, no racism, no hate speech, no LGBTQphobia, no nazis, no spam, no public unflagged porn, etc...
Then, I also believe it's important to remind you that this server was made and is run by a queer activist.
This server thrives to be inclusive, and I will ban without much regret.
People are encouraged to use the report function as they see fit, and can be confident that their complaints will be heard and dealt with in some way. I want everyone to feel safe here, and if that doesn't sound like something you like, you should probably find another server.

There's also a pretty important activism aspect of this instance.
If you're a marketer, a #digital #influencer, this is not the place for you. Not only do I feel you should not feel welcome, I intend to make you feel definitely NOT welcome.
This instance, and this entire social network in my opinion, is dedicated to reclaiming social media, decentralizing, and generally creating better and more engaging communities.
The three categories of people I mentioned earlier are not, in my opinion, working towards this goal, pretty much the opposite, and they are not welcome on this server.
Please report them if you see them.
We also block Nazis, techbros and RMS.

info.short_description: A place for creative folks to interact without all the noise.

Social @ Play Vicious is the social media component of the forth coming fourth version (ha) of Play Vicious. While Play Vicious itself will be a platform for content and consumables, interaction with said content will be handled by Social. Think of it as a federated media site that will work in cohesion with it's own social media installation.

I know. I think it's pretty cool too.

info.short_description: Its an unfettered space for Activists. Founded on #4opens, motivated by the #PGA hallmarks and moderated by an ethical code of conduct.
info.full_description:
"We can't engage as communities, unless we have money. I can't even express how angry this makes me." 
- an activist group using Facebook. People and organisations who feel this way are our initial targets.

We are launching two new Mastodon instances for activists and campaigners to aid communication of grassroot groups; putting social media back in our hands by providing a free, unfettered home for campaigners, NGO‚Äôs and activists to communicate among their peers and beyond.

This project is a way out of the restricted, algorithmic, for-profit mediation and commercialisation of communication we increasingly experience. If you do not pay to "boost" each post, a Facebook page will only reach 3-6% of members. This soon becomes an expensive drain on limited NGO and activist budgets. 
Activists and campaigners alike are ready to shift their outreach away from the corporate social networks paid-per-view ‚Äúwalled gardens‚Äù.

Mastodon is the worlds largest free open source decentralised microblogging network; it‚Äôs thousands of unique, interconnected communities, filled with different people, interests, languages, and needs. 
You‚Äôre free to join any community you like, or better yet, host your own, on your own terms. It remains possible for members of each to instance to interact with others. 
There is no monopoly by a single commercial company, no ads, and no tracking.

We aim to help activism/campaigning groups to make this step now.

https://campaign.openworlds.info 
https://activism.openworlds.info
info.topic: Its an unfettered space for Activists and groups to communicate via #openweb projects.

info.short_description: Mastodon instance hosted in Vietnam
info.full_description:
We‚Äôve set up a Commie Twitter clone for those at risk of suspension / shadowbans etc

We host it, we secure it, we manage it, we moderate it. No tracking, no selling your data, no giving it to spooks, no ads in the TL, you won‚Äôt get suspended for calling Bob Geldof rude names.

It‚Äôs free for all now, it will remain free for customers, donors, moderators etc

Standard house rules :

No Nazis

No Nonces

No Regime Changers

Instant ban for all these 3 categories.

The rest of the rules will evolve over time

Use long passwords

Turn 2FA on

Sign up and then stick your cheeky red address in the bio of your twitter account so folk know where to find you if you get hit by their banhammer.

There are loads of apps to use. see here.

https://github.com/tootsuite/documentation/blob/master/Using-Mastodon/Apps.md

It may still be a bit Beta around the edges so any bugs please report.

Start your engines Comrades.

info.short_description: A Mastodon instance that focuses primarily on technology, especially IT, DevOps, and Programming.
info.full_description:
The community of this instance focuses primarily on technology, especially IT, DevOps, and Programming. We mostly run a clean community, and do not allow NSFW content.

Our Code of Conduct
- No discrimination. We're all people here, there is no reason to discriminate against anyone because of their age, gender, sexual identity, or race.
- Swearing is allowed, but don't be excessively vulgar just for the sake of being vulgar.
- No illegal activities, this include piracy, doxing, DDoSing, etc. Please do not discuss committing these acts, or information for others to do it.
- No links to malicious software. This goes hand in hand with the last guideline, but doing this will result in immediate account termination.
- Be kind to others, and understand that not everyone is a professional. People make mistakes and we all learn something new every day. We try to promote learning here, and teaching someone else something new can feel really great, give it a try!

info.short_description: Yiff.Rocks is a stable, non-tracking Mastodon instance operated by furries, for furries. (friends are always welcome!)
info.full_description:
TL;DR
We follow a mostly laissez faire approach to the server, with only a few caveats.
We do not track you, Nor do we want to. (but others on the Fediverse might, no instance can guarantee this)
We are operated as a hobby first and foremost. Donations are cool but running a VPS is super affordable.
Light moderation. The instance rules are defined below.
We federate with everyone, but we don't cater to those who can't accept our already lenient standards.
Rules
Only the usual to keep things viable.
Be civil.
Don't spam. (applies mostly to bots.)
Use NSFW content warnings when needed!
US Law applies, don't do anything illegal here.
Must be at least 13 years of age (See COPPA Law in ToS). You will be banned.

info.full_description: Mastodon instance hosted in Norway, for general usage.

info.short_description: Extremely Online is a Mastodon instance that aims to be a friendly, positive place for anyone to spend their time online. Specifically, we encourage w
info.full_description:
Extremely Online is a Mastodon instance that aims to be a friendly, positive place for anyone to spend their time online. Specifically, we encourage web developers, mobile developers, and anyone else whose interests lie adjacent to those to make us their home in the fediverse.

We're committed to providing an environment where members of the LGBTQ+ community, minorities, and just about anyone else can feel safe and confident that they won't be subject to abuse.

Also, while we don't explicitly disallow NSFW content, we do request that you put it behind a CW when posting to the public timeline.

info.short_description: A general instance with a solarpunk theme. Anarchist and green.
info.full_description:
A friendly, diverse instance that focuses on creating a better future. Topics include Anarchism, Anticapitalism, technology, ecology, social justice, and much more - or anything you like!

We aim to provide a positive, inclusive space for people from different backgrounds and opinions that want to make the world a better place, one smell step at a time. Or just hang out with other cool people.

We are inspired by the solarpunk genre of art and literature.
